TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來呈現具有視覺化樣式的文字方塊控制項的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a text box control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現作業系統的目前視覺化樣式的文字方塊控制項的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a text box control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 這非常有用，如果要繪製自訂控制項應該具有目前視覺化樣式的外觀。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要繪製的文字方塊中，使用其中一種方法。To draw a text box, use one of the methods. 這些方法會提供各種不同的選項，例如套用文字格式，或指定的文字範圍。These methods provide a variety of options, such as applying text formatting or specifying text bounds. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的工作區會繪製目前視覺化樣式的文字方塊。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, will draw the text box with the current visual style. 否則，請將會擲回。Otherwise, will throw an . 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，您可以檢查的值屬性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中的項目類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 呈現具有視覺化樣式的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂控制項，以便使用方法，以畫出文字方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the method to draw a text box. 控制項也可讓使用者選取的其中一個来套用至文字的值方塊的文字。The control also allows the user to select one of the values to apply to the text box text. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 使用作業系統的目前視覺化樣式繪製文字方塊控制項。

span.span: Draws a text box control with the current visual style of the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法之前，您應該確認屬性會傳回`true`。Before calling this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`.

exception.span: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 使用者已停用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

summary.span: 取得值，指出 類別是否可用來繪製具有視覺化樣式的文字方塊。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a text box with visual styles.

value.span: 如果使用者在作業系統中已經啟用視覺化樣式，而且應用程式視窗的工作區中已經套用視覺化樣式，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性是`false`，則方法會擲回。If this property is `false`, the method will throw an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用屬性來判斷是否要使用方法。The following code example uses the property to determine whether to use the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
